body: If I upvote a post on the main page, but then open the link, it's not upvoted. I open the post and upvote in the link, but switch back to the main page, it's not upvoted there, I have to hit it again. I hope I explained that correctly. Glitch in the matrix?
body_html: If I upvote a post on the main page, but then open the link, it's not upvoted. I open the post and upvote in the link, but switch back to the main page, it's not upvoted there, I have to hit it again. I hope I explained that correctly. Glitch in the matrix?
title: Upvotes Not Showing on Threads When You Open the Thread

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Ruqqus does not keep live post and comment scores. Your votes do count, but they won't appear to affect the total score until the servers recalculate it again.
body_html: Ruqqus does not keep live post and comment scores. Your votes do count, but they won't appear to affect the total score until the servers recalculate it again.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
